title: Working Memory-Based Instructional Design for Culinary Arts Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic culinary skills and intermediate-level cooking experience
context.additional_context: Blended program for practicing chefs applying working memory theory to culinary education. Project-based assessment in a BYOD environment emphasizes practical competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can understand the cognitive functions of working memory and explain its application in culinary tasks.
Learners can design and implement recipe-learning strategies that account for working memory load.
Learners can present case studies demonstrating a 20%+ improvement in working memory efficiency using digital tools (e.g., note-taking apps).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
